key.description: the engagement app's unique (within that app) and immutable key for this engagement type

daysToExpire.description: the number of elapsed days before this engagements result is no longer valid - pass 0 to never expire

isPassFail.description: whether this engagement results in an unambiguous pass/fail result, as stored in assessmentDetail.overallResult.passedIndicator

candidateSeesResults.description: whether the candidate should have visibility of the results of this engagement, including pass/fail

canReuse.description: whether an unexpired engagement result on one job application can be reused when the candidate makes another job application
